name: backend
description: Local Network Office Room Task Display System Backend

scripts.build:frontend: cd ../frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.copy:frontend: if exist public rmdir /s /q public && mkdir public && xcopy /E /I /Y ..\frontend\dist public
scripts.build:exe: npm i -g pkg && pkg . --targets node18-win-x64 --output OfficeTaskSystem.exe
